WorkItem.Description: Just testing out the updates for unbundling 835 files at loop 2100 (individual claim).  It works, but it creates a duplicate loop 2000 in each unbundled file.  So if I start out with a file with 3 claims, I'll get 3 output files, but within each of those, the claim is duplicated at the loop 2000 level.

Comments.Message:
Okay, I found the problem.  This happens when attempting to unbundle by a loop that's inside a loop instead of hierarchical loop.
It also affects loop 2400 on an 837.  I've added unit tests to verify the unbundled message is exactly as expected.  Thanks for the thorough testing.
